info.title: Skindora API
info.description: API for the Skindora application, handling user authentication, management, and other core features.

tags.name: Users
tags.description: Operations related to user authentication, profile, and management.

tags.name: Staffs
tags.description: Operations available only to staff and admin roles.

tags.name: Reviews
tags.description: Operations for creating and managing product reviews.

tags.name: Products
tags.description: Operations for viewing and managing products.

post.description: Creates a new user account, sends a verification email, and returns access/refresh tokens.

422.description: Validation error (e.g., email exists, password mismatch).

post.description: Authenticates a user with email and password, returning access and refresh tokens.
Invalidates the provided refresh token, effectively logging the user out. Requires a valid access token for authentication.

401.description: Unauthorized (invalid access token or refresh token).

post.description: Sends a forgot password token to the user's email if the email exists.

404.description: User with the provided email not found.

post.description: Checks if the provided forgot password token is valid.
Sets a new password for the user using a valid forgot password token.
Verifies a user's email with the provided token. Returns new tokens upon successful first-time verification.

200.description: Email verification status. Can be a success message or a new set of tokens.

post.description: Resends a new email verification token to the authenticated user's email.

403.description: Forbidden (user is banned or already verified).

put.description: Allows an authenticated and verified user to change their password by providing the old and new password.

401.description: Unauthorized (invalid access token or old password does not match).

422.description: Validation error (e.g., new passwords don't match).

get.description: Retrieves the profile information of the currently authenticated user.

patch.description: Partially updates the profile information of the authenticated user. Only include the fields to be changed.

post.description: Issues a new access token and refresh token in exchange for a valid refresh token.

401.description: Unauthorized (refresh token is invalid, used, or non-existent).

get.description: Callback endpoint for the Google OAuth 2.0 flow. This should not be called directly. The user is redirected here by Google after authentication. The service then redirects the user to the client application with tokens in the URL.

parameters.name: code
parameters.description: The authorization code provided by Google.

302.description: Redirect to the client application with tokens in the query parameters.

Location.description: The URL to redirect the user's browser to.

400.description: Bad Request (e.g., Google account's email is not verified).

post.description: Adds one or more products to the authenticated user's wishlist.

put.description: Removes one or more products from the authenticated user's wishlist.

get.description: Retrieves the list of product IDs in the authenticated user's wishlist.
Retrieves a paginated list of all active vouchers available for users.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of items per page.

parameters.name: code
parameters.description: Filter vouchers by a search term in their code.

200.description: A paginated list of active vouchers.

get.description: Allows authenticated staff members to retrieve a paginated list of all products in the system. This provides a comprehensive view of products for management purposes.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of products to return per page.

401.description: Unauthorized. Access token is missing or invalid.

403.description: Forbidden. The user is not a staff or admin.

post.summary: Add a new review for a product
post.description: Allows an authenticated user to add a review (rating and comment) for a specific product they have purchased in a delivered order.

parameters.name: orderId
parameters.description: The ID of the delivered order.

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: The ID of the product within the order to be reviewed.

403.description: Forbidden. Order has not been delivered or has already been reviewed.

put.description: Allows an authenticated user to update their existing review for a product.

parameters.name: orderId
parameters.description: The ID of the order containing the product review.

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: The ID of the product being reviewed.

404.description: Review, Order, or Product not found.

delete.description: Allows an authenticated user to delete their review for a product.

parameters.name: orderId
parameters.description: The ID of the order containing the product review.

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: The ID of the product being reviewed.

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of all reviews for a specific product. This is a public endpoint.

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: The ID of the product to get reviews for.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of reviews per page.

parameters.name: rating
parameters.description: Filter reviews by a specific rating (1-5).

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of all products for public viewing. This endpoint returns a simplified version of the product object, suitable for list displays.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of products to return per page.

refresh_token.description: The refresh token issued to the user during login, which will be invalidated upon logout.

ResetPasswordReqBody.description: Requires forgot_password_token alongside new password details.

password.description: The user's new password (must be strong).

UpdateMeReqBody.description: Fields to update for the user's profile. All fields are optional.

username.description: A new unique username for the user. Must not be already taken by another user.

avatar.description: A URL pointing to the user's new avatar image.

refresh_token.description: The valid refresh token that was provided upon login.

productId.description: An array of product IDs to add to the wishlist.
An array of product IDs to remove from the wishlist.

Product.description: Represents a full product object with all details.

rating.description: Rating for the product, from 1 to 5.

comment.description: A text comment for the review.

images.description: An array of image URLs for the review.

videos.description: An array of video URLs for the review.

rating.description: New rating for the product, from 1 to 5.

comment.description: New text comment for the review.

images.description: An array of new image URLs for the review.

videos.description: An array of new video URLs for the review.

comment.example: Cht lng sn phm tuyt vi.

data.description: An array of product IDs in the user's wishlist.

BearerAuth.description: Enter JWT access token in the format: Bearer <token>
